block_rss.title: Module RSS block.
block_rss.description: A block added to the RSS feed list
block_rss.condition: Generated if at least an entity has RSS enabled.

entity_admin_block.title: Entity admin block.
entity_admin_block.description: This is the main admin block for the entities. The grid container
entity_admin_block.condition: Is generated if the entity does not behave as tree

entity_admin_edit_block.title: Entity admin edit block.
entity_admin_edit_block.description: This is the entity admin edit block: form container

entity_admin_edit_form_block.title: Entity admin edit form block.
entity_admin_edit_form_block.description: This is the entity admin edit form block

entity_admin_abstract_block.title: Entity admin abstract block.
entity_admin_abstract_block.description: This is a block used as parent for different tree behaving entities blocks
entity_admin_abstract_block.condition: This is genereted for entities that behave as tree.

entity_file_helper_block.title: Entity form file renderer.
entity_file_helper_block.description: This is the rendered for file fields.
entity_file_helper_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have at least a file field

entity_tree_block.title: Tree block.
entity_tree_block.description: This is the rendered for file fields.
entity_tree_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have at least a file field

entity_widget_chooser_block.title: Entity widget chooser .
entity_widget_chooser_block.description: This helps you choose your widget entity.
entity_widget_chooser_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have widgets enabled

entity_product_list_block.title: Entity product list block
entity_product_list_block.description: Block that lists associated products on entity page.
entity_product_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities that are related to products.

entity_category_list_block.title: Entity category list block
entity_category_list_block.description: Block that lists associated categories on entity page.
entity_category_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities that are related to categories.

product_entity_list_block.title: Entity list on product page
product_entity_list_block.description: This block is used to show the entities related to the product on the product list.
product_entity_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities are linked with products and are set to appear in the product list.

category_entity_list_block.title: Entity list on category page
category_entity_list_block.description: This block is used to show the entities related to the category on the category list.
category_entity_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities are linked with products and are set to appear in the product list.

entity_list_block.title: Entity list page
entity_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have frontend list enabled

entity_image_helper_block.title: Entity form image renderer.
entity_image_helper_block.description: This is the rendered for image fields.
entity_image_helper_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have at least an image field

entity_rss_block.title: Entity RSS block.
entity_rss_block.description: This block handles the rss generation for an entity.
entity_rss_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have RSS enabled

entity_sibling_list_block.title: Entity sibling list block
entity_sibling_list_block.description: This block lists the siblings of an entity
entity_sibling_list_block.condition: This is generated for entities that have siblings

entity_widget_link_block.title: Entity link widget block
entity_widget_link_block.description: This block handles the entity link widget.
entity_widget_link_block.condition: Is generated for entities that have widgets enabled

entity_widget_view_block.title: Entity view widget block
entity_widget_view_block.description: This block handles the entity view widget.
entity_widget_view_block.condition: Is generated for entities that have widgets enabled

entity_widget_subtree_block.title: Entity subtree widget block
entity_widget_subtree_block.description: This block handles the subtree view widget.
entity_widget_subtree_block.condition: Is generated for entities that have widgets enabled and behave as tree

product_entity_tab.title: Entity tab on product form
product_entity_tab.description: This is the block for the entity tab on the product add/edit form
product_entity_tab.condition: s generated for any entity that is related many to many with products

category_entity_tab.title: Entity tab on product form
category_entity_tab.description: This is the block for the entity tab on the category add/edit form
category_entity_tab.condition: s generated for any entity that is related many to many with categories

entity_view_block.title: Entity view block
entity_view_block.description: This is the entity view page main block.
entity_view_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have a frontend view enabled

entity_child_list_block.title: Entity children list block
entity_child_list_block.description: Block that lists the entity child entities.
entity_child_list_block.condition: It is generated for entities in parent/child relation

entity_children_list_block.title: Entity child nodes list block
entity_children_list_block.description: Block that lists the entity child nodes.
entity_children_list_block.condition: It is generated for tree entities that have frontend enabled.

wysiwyg_helper_block.title: WISIWYG helper block.
wysiwyg_helper_block.description: Helper block for tree attributes with editors
wysiwyg_helper_block.condition: Generated if there is at least one tree entity that has an attribute that uses WYSIWYG editor

fieldset_renderer_block.title: Element renderer for EAV attributes.

fieldset_renderer_block.condition: Generated if there is at least one EAV entity

wysiwyg_content_block.title: Helper for WYSIWYG attributes.
wysiwyg_content_block.condition: Generated if there is at least one EAV entity

entity_form_tabs.title: Entity admin tabs block.
entity_form_tabs.description: Block used to generate the tabs in the admin add/edit form.

store_selection_tab_block.title: Entity admin stores tab.
store_selection_tab_block.description: From this tab you can select the store to publish your entity.
store_selection_tab_block.condition: It is generated for entities that can be set to stores.

entity_admin_meta_block.title: Admin tab for meta data.
entity_admin_meta_block.description: From this tab you can set the meta attribute values for the entity.
entity_admin_meta_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have frontend view enabled and meta attributes enabled

entity_admin_product_block.title: Admin tab product relation.
entity_admin_product_block.description: From this tab you can set the related products to your entity.
entity_admin_product_block.condition: It is generated for entities that have link to products enabled

entity_admin_category_block.title: Admin tab category relation.
entity_admin_category_block.description: From this tab you can set the related categories to your entity.

entity_admin_sibling_block.title: Admin siblings tab.
entity_admin_sibling_block.description: From this tab you can set the related entities.
entity_admin_sibling_block.condition: It is generated for entities that are siblings with your current entity

entity_admin_form_block.title: Admin Entity edit form.
entity_admin_form_block.description: This is the block with all the entity fields.
entity_admin_form_block.condition: It is generated for flat entities

entity_admin_attributes_block.title: Admin Entity attributes form.
entity_admin_attributes_block.description: This is the block with the entity attributes.
entity_admin_attributes_block.condition: It is generated for EAV entities

router.condition: Generated if at least one entity has url rewrites enabled.

entity_model_attribute_api.condition: Generated for each eav entities that has SOAP API enabled

entity_model_attribute_api_v2.title: Entity attribute SOAP API V2 model
entity_model_attribute_api_v2.description: Model used to handle the SOAP API V2 calls for entity attributes
entity_model_attribute_api_v2.condition: Generated for each eav entities that has SOAP API enabled

api2.title: api2.xml - REST config file
api2.description: The configuration for the REST API
api2.condition: Generated if there is at least one entity that should have the REST API

api2_model.title: REST API entity model
api2_model.description: The main model for the entity REST API
api2_model.condition: Generated if there the entity should have the REST API

api2_model_rest.title: REST API entity model - rest handler
api2_model_rest.description: The main handler model for the entity REST API
api2_model_rest.condition: Generated if there the entity should have the REST API

api2_model_rest_guest.title: REST API entity model - guest handler
api2_model_rest_guest.description: The guest handler model for the entity REST API
api2_model_rest_guest.condition: Generated if there the entity should have the REST API

api2_model_rest_customer.title: REST API entity model - customer handler
api2_model_rest_customer.description: The customer handler model for the entity REST API
api2_model_rest_customer.condition: Generated if there the entity should have the REST API

api2_model_rest_admin.title: REST API entity model - admin handler
api2_model_rest_admin.description: The admin handler model for the entity REST API
api2_model_rest_admin.condition: Generated if there the entity should have the REST API

relation_column_renderer.title: Admin column renderer for linked entities
relation_column_renderer.description: Block for rendering columns of related entities
relation_column_renderer.condition: Generated if are entities related or at least one entity is in a "many to many" relation with the products or categories.

parent_column_renderer.title: Admin column renderer for parent entities entities
parent_column_renderer.description: Block for rendering columns of parent entities entities
parent_column_renderer.condition: Generated if there is at least one parent-child relation between entities.
